title: Is that OK if I'll create new account?
body: I want to try new leveling system on a blank account. (I just remember how horrible it was to promote acc to level 30 but that was so many years ago so I want to compare) That's pretty much all. Is that legal?

replies.body: Yea absolutely! A lot of our players make multiple accounts, lovingly referred to as 'smurfs'. Feel free to create a new account to experience the new leveling system to it's fullest, heck I know I am!
